entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
